title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing snow in a dream: Seeing snow in a dream is one of the visions that many people see in their dreams, and many people search for an interpretation of this vision to know what this vision brings, as seeing snow carries many different indicators, whether positive or negative. Interpretation Dreaming of seeing snow in a dream Dreaming of snow in a dream is interpreted with different indications. When we see it at the right time, it indicates the disappearance of anxiety and relief, while its appearance in others indicates suffering from an illness or perhaps disrupting the journey that the person was hoping for or wishing for what happened. Dreaming of snow in a dream is also interpreted as evidence of the disappearance of prey and the power of insight. In the case of a dream about melting snow on the hand, this indicates fleeing after desires, turning away from worship, and getting closer to God Almighty. Others also explained that melting snow on the hand is a sign of excess and spending money in areas that do not benefit insight. Interpretation of a dream about seeing snow in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the sign of interpretation of Ibn Sirin is that seeing snow in a dream indicates calm, tranquility, and reassurance, as well as the coming of good things. He also interprets seeing ice melting as one of the unfortunate visions that expresses the financial loss of a lot of money in exchange for the visions. He also explained that if he sees Someone sees scattered snow blocking his path, this is a sign that the visionary will face many obstacles as he passes on his way to achieving his dreams. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream for a single woman. Seeing snow in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates permanent stability and bliss in a state of calm in addition to success in her life. The majority of commentators explain that if he sees himself consuming ice cubes, this indicates that he has a lot of money to spend that is misplaced and useless. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees pure white ice in her dream, this vision indicates that she is happy. With her married life and that she is completely satisfied with her husband as he works and strives for her, but if a married woman sees in her dream that the sky is falling lightly with snow, then seeing it indicates the purity of her heart, the disappearance of her heart and anxiety, and her relief from distress in the private parts, God willing, she will have to be patient. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream By Ibn Sirin for a married woman and its meaning is evidence of goodness and blessing in this woman’s life, especially if the sky is raining snow. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman, and it means fear and clouds that fly over that woman if snow accumulates in her house or in front of the house. White snow Very in a woman's dream is good news for a lot of life coming to her because she may be pregnant after a short period of vision and her husband may have a long life. Snow falling on a married woman or her house indicates financial prosperity that will come to that woman, but playing with snow in a dream is bad. Because it may indicate the misfortunes of the person who has this vision. The whiter the snow in a person’s dreams

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing you flying in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing someone flying in a dream? An indication of the fulfillment of hopes and aspirations. What is the meaning of seeing someone in a dream flying among the clouds? It shows that he is approaching his end. What is the interpretation of seeing an obstruction while flying suddenly? Evidence of inner fear. What does it mean to see yourself Flying in one dream? The argument for kindness and it is one of her good visions. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself flying on the ground? Showing that he will get money and become rich. Interpretation of a dream about escaping by Ibn Sirin. Flying in a dream is an indication of the fulfillment of hopes and aspirations. Then flying in a dream shows the achievement of goals And the ability to make the right decisions. Flying is a sign of freedom from some of the thoughts that occupy the mind of the fortuneteller. Then seeing a person in a dream flying between the clouds, this indicates the approach of his death. Seeing a dream about a man’s flightIf a man sees in a dream that he is flying a short distance in the sky and encounters Difficulty in flying, this indicates the presence of obstacles to achieving goals. The inability to fly in a dream indicates bad decisions. Then, suddenly, the inability to fly is evidence of inner fear. Then if a person sees in a dream that he is flying, this indicates a Hajj and visit. House of God. When a man sees in a dream that he is flying with visible wings, this indicates that something important happened in the dreamer’s dream. If a person sees in a dream that he is flying from one place to another, this is evidence of travel. Interpretation of a dream about a singles’ tripIf an unmarried girl sees in Dreaming that she is flying around the house or around the house, this means that she will get married soon. So, seeing flying in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of kindness and is one of the praiseworthy visions for her. If she sees in a dream that she is flying and does not know her way, this is evidence of a conspiracy She will be exposed to it. Seeing a dream about flying for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is flying from a high place to a lower place, this indicates a financial loss that she and her husband will face soon. Next, if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is flying around the houses next to her, then this It indicates that she will marry again. If a married woman sees that she is flying and has wings, this is a sign that she will get a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Nabulus: If someone dreams that he is flying over a mountain, this means that he will gain strength, but without any problems and easily. If one sees In a dream, he is flying in the sky between the clouds and cannot return, this indicates death. Whoever sees that he is flying in a straight and balanced plane, this is evidence of improving his personal conditions and changing them for the better. Then seeing it flying to the ground is a sign that he will obtain money and become... Wealthy. Flying in a dream indicates strength and determination.

title: Interpretation of the menstrual cycle in a dream (meaning of seeing menstruation)

preview.html: Interpretation of the menstrual cycle in a dream, presented to you through an encyclopedia website. Interpretation of dreams is considered one of the most important topics that concern many people in the environment and social life. There are many interpreters that seeing menstrual blood can be a good sign and it can be a sign. In illness and exposure to crises and problems, there are many theories about dreams and what is the reason for their appearance? It may not be the subject of our discussion, but this must be remembered. We find a theory that says that dreams are nothing but desires and motives that a person has and he cannot reveal them, and most of them cannot be achieved in reality by seeing them in a dream, and in the following paragraphs we explain to you the interpretation of seeing the menstrual cycle from the perspective of Interpretation scholars in a number of different contexts. Interpretation of the menstrual cycle in dreams. Some say that seeing menstruation in a dream is one of the visions that indicate sins and transgressions committed by the dreamer, and it can have many other connotations. Below we will learn about the meaning of seeing menstrual blood in a dream. It should be noted that the monarch is the one who can determine the most appropriate and closest interpretation to him, by specifying all the surrounding circumstances, which certainly has a significant impact on the interpretation of the dream. Seeing menstruation or menstrual blood in a dream can be one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds the dreamer of the coming of goodness and the achievement of Desires. Some believe that if a woman sees herself as if she is in her menstrual period and that blood is flowing profusely, the vision indicates that God will give her the opportunity to achieve all of her dreams that she tried so hard to achieve. There are those who believe that a woman’s vision of her menstrual period in her dream symbolizes that she feels anxious and stressed and that she She suffers a lot in her life. It is possible that seeing menstruation is a sign that the difficult time is over and that the dreamer will be able to overcome the worries and difficulties he faces. If the visionary is an old woman, then the vision is a symbol of her exposure to illness. If the woman sees that menstrual blood is less Ordinarily, this symbolizes a large number of sins. But if a woman sees that she is bathing after menstruation, this is a sign of her cleansing of sins and repentance from all sins. One of the interpretations that interpreters believe is that if the dreamer sees herself during her menstrual period, this symbolizes her engagement. The imminent marriage date. It symbolizes a man who sees himself menstruating, as it appears that he does many things and sins that he must give up, repent to God and not repeat them. A man may see menstrual blood or a woman’s menstruation in a dream, as this indicates that he will be exposed to problems. And instability. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees menstrual blood in a dream, this means that she is suffering from some problems in her life. A married woman seeing menstrual blood may be an indication of an unwelcome sign, that what she is suffering from will get worse. And she will suffer from worry and sadness for a while, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is menstruating during an intimate relationship with her husband in a dream, this means that

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing a butterfly in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a butterfly flying around a girl? It means that the person who is attracted to her can marry her. What does it mean to see a butterfly in the house? It means the beginning of happy changes in her life. The interpretation of seeing a colorful butterfly? It means renewing ambition in yourself. What does it mean to see a butterfly entering the kitchen? Married woman? This means paying off debts. Also the interpretation of seeing a blue butterfly entering your house? It means problems with your wife or children. Interpretation of seeing a butterfly for individuals. The butterfly that flies around the girl, that is, the person who is attracted to her, can marry her. The butterfly, means a religious husband, and radical changes will occur in Your life.Interpretation of a butterfly in the house means the beginning of happy changes in her life. She prefers white and green butterflies, they symbolize optimism and kindness.If the butterfly stops at the girl and flies away, then this is a happy thing that will happen to you again. Dream of a butterfly for a married womanIf the butterfly is colored, it means Renewal of ambition in yourself, perhaps you will find a new job in an important company. If the butterfly is standing on your bed, you need to prepare mentally and physically, you may get pregnant soon. A butterfly flies and stands on your leg, his situation will change for the better with a new job, financial promotion etc. Go ahead. Butterflies are light colors of white, red, or green, and they are all good. A dream about a butterfly for a pregnant woman. If a married woman is pregnant and the butterfly is on your bed, this means that childbirth will be soon. The interpretation of seeing a butterfly for a pregnant woman means that her baby is female, if it is multi-colored, and if it has One color is male, and God knows best. A butterfly that enters the bedroom means the return of an absent person if your husband is traveling or the recovery of your husband if he is sick. Interpretation of a dream about white butterflies: The color white carries kindness, especially if it is in very sensitive and beautiful creatures like butterflies. If a single woman sees a white butterfly, She is your wife, and if a married man finds her hovering around him, then these are the events that you have been waiting for. And your status will rise in your family and in your work, because goodness is hovering around you. Interpretation of seeing a butterfly entering a married woman’s kitchen means paying off your financial debts and providing abundant support. Entering the living room means calm and stability, and if you stand on your children’s bed At an early age, this means the marriage of your children. Interpretation of a dream about a blue butterfly. In the interpretation of seeing a blue butterfly, commentators said that this is evil that befalls you. If it flies around you, this means some problems that disturb your life. The entry of a blue butterfly into your home means problems with your wife or children. If the butterfly is Colorful, these are happy events or a meeting with the absent. Dream of killing a butterfly. A butterfly is happiness and loyal friends in your dream. While the interpretation of seeing a butterfly and killing it. Either you chase it and try to kill it, it means deceiving a friend or refusing to serve this if the butterfly you killed was colored, while killing a black butterfly means trying to keep it away. Bad thoughts and ideas from your mind. If you kill a yellow butterfly, it is considered a cure for an illness or the release of a prisoner, and God knows best.

If you kill a yellow butterfly, it is considered a cure for an illness or the release of a prisoner, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a pregnant woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about the sea for a pregnant woman? Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a pregnant woman in a dream. Does the vision of the dry sea mentioned by the commentators have great importance? What is the difference in interpretation between a rough sea and a calm sea? What did Ibn Sirin say about this vision? Since the symbol of the sea is full of interesting interpretations and meanings, we will explain its most prominent indicators in the following article. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a pregnant woman. The sea in a dream for a pregnant woman, if its color is clear, and the sky in the dream is beautiful and its color is soothing to the nerves, and the pregnant woman feels relaxed in the dream, as the vision shows kindness and living. . And an easy delivery. As for the sea, if the pregnant woman sees it in her dream, and its color is black, and its waves are frightening, then this vision does not bode well, and indicates a lot of pain and harsh conditions that she is going through. If the pregnant woman sees herself catching a lot of fish from the sea, then The dream indicates an increase in luxury and money in her life. When she dreams of catching shrimp from the sea in a dream, this symbol indicates her high status, changing her life for the better and a lot of money with her. If she sees in a dream that she is taking precious stones from the sea without swimming in it or offering Her life is in danger, so this is good that God gives her without fatigue or suffering. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. The symbol of the sea according to Ibn Sirin refers to hundreds of meanings and interpretations. He said: If a pregnant woman sees the sea in her dream, and it is far away, then these are hardships that will be distributed in her fate and will come. . In her life, whenever she is afraid to see the sea in a dream, the scene shows the dangers she is immersed in. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream a raging sea causing the sinking of many ships traveling in it, and its levels rising and houses being flooded, and causing many losses in the dream, this is a metaphor. For its growth. There are many worries and problems in her life. If a pregnant woman sees that she is swimming in the sea, bathing in it, and cleaning her clothes and body from the dirt that was stuck to them, then illness and pain have reached their peak in her life, but God will provide for her. With help, she will remove her distress and suffering and live a new life without problems and fatigue. The most important interpretations of a dream about the sea for a pregnant womanDrinking sea water in a dream for a pregnant womanWhen a pregnant woman drinks salty sea water and feels that it is very salty and drinks it with disgust, the dream is completely devoid of positives. The expert enters into a great whirlpool of problems and worries, and only God can save her from it. Bathing in the sea in a pregnant woman’s dream. If the pregnant woman sees that she went down to the sea to bathe (knowing that she was red-handed in the dream), this is evidence that she has recovered from the disease and that her worries are about to end. But if she saw it. Her clothes were more dirty than usual and it took a long time to remove this dirt with sea water. The dream indicates that the difficulties and problems of her life will not end until many efforts lead to a feeling of stress and exhaustion, but... a

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a bird in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream for a single woman: Birds are considered beautiful birds that people want to see and buy to grow indoors, and therefore there is a strong relationship between the bird and people, as they do not cause harm, but a person feels happy when he hears their beautiful voice and sees their distinctive colors, but from What is good is seeing a bird in a dream for individuals, such as the girl’s happiness with these birds, in reality? A bird in a dream for a single woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a bird in a dream indicates many things about a single girl, and interpretation experts confirm that the girl’s condition in a dream is one of the things Which affects the interpretation of the dream, in addition to the color of the bird. A large number of birds in one dream is a door to happiness for her. It is a sign of connection to a good and wealthy person who will bring her success and joy in her days or a sign of an increase in her livelihood. In a specific subject, such as academic excellence or earning a lot of money from work. If a girl sees that the bird is pecking at her and causing her harm, this is an indication of the problems she faces in reality and may be an explanation for her loss of money. Seeing a black bird is not a good vision for him, as it is It indicates his actions that made him distance himself from people, in addition to the sins and sins that he committed in his life. As for seeing the bird sitting in his hand, it is considered a sign that dreams and desires will soon come true. The presence of birds inside their home is one of the things that brings them joy and happiness, as happiness enters To the house and various circumstances occur in it that make the people of that house happy. Ibn Sirin claims that seeing a bird in a dream for an unmarried woman is a clear sign of marriage to a wealthy man who has great power, but it is It is possible that you will not feel satisfied or happy with him as a result of his stinginess. . Giving and love. It appears that if a girl hears the sounds of birds in a dream and she is happy and laughing out loud, this is a sign that she will hear good news in reality that will give her comfort and peace in her next life. It is believed that seeing him in a dream indicates lightness of spirit and her love for joy and happiness and its connotations, in addition to that The dream is a sign of beauty and a tolerant spirit. As for seeing dead birds, it does not bring her good, especially if it falls on her from above, as it indicates many sins and bad deeds that she has committed in reality, and she must repent immediately. title: Interpretation of a dream that I am pregnant, meaning of pregnancy in a dream

preview.html: Pregnancy in a dream for a married woman, for a single woman, for a single woman, giving birth to a boy or a girl by Ibn Sirin and more Interpretation of pregnancy in a dream A woman's pregnancy in a dream indicates her insistence on her affairs, and she takes money from him, so her growth increases and he praises her. And if someone sees that he has a rope, it is a heavy burden hidden from people who fear its abundance and appearance, and the rope is an increase in the world for the owner of the vision, whether it is male or female, and seeing a pregnant woman is anxiety, sadness and hidden matters, and a man's rope in a dream is evidence of an increase in knowledge in the world. Perhaps it indicates his worries, sadness and closeness to his enemy or his love and romance. It indicates someone who mixed males and females in one place, or planted something in the wrong place, or a thief broke into his house, or hid a cache in his house, or stole a theft and hid it from its owner. Perhaps a man's rope indicates his loss. Perhaps he buried his loved ones among the dead strangers. Perhaps he was a liar pretending to be a liar. And perhaps he conceals his conviction and spoils his conviction. As for the rope of old age, it may indicate the stagnation that reaches its people because of it. It may indicate a bad accident in its place from a thief or a fire. A jinn may wear it, or a device may be made to fit it, or an unsuitable person may be kept for her, or she may lose her virginity before her marriage. As for the pregnancy of the barren woman or the male of the beasts and cows, this is evidence of the dryness of the year, the lack of good in it, and the abundance of temptations and evil from thieves. And whoever dreams: that his wife is pregnant, he wishes for the best in this world. And whoever sees: that he has a rope, this is an increase in his money and in his life, and it is suitable for women and men in every case, and the rope of the old woman is a weapons cabinet, it is rebellion, and it is said that her rope is unemployment from work, and it is said that she is fertile after the barren, and the woman without a man, as well as the virgin if she sees that she is pregnant, she will marry. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the pregnancy of an unmarried or virgin woman, this is good for her, as this vision indicates her adherence to religion, faith and piety, with regard to the distress and anxiety of her family. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I am married and I do not have children If the pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant and has not given birth before, this indicates good skin and vaginal tightness, and it can be good news for the child. Some scholars of interpretation differed in the interpretation of this dream. I dreamed that I am pregnant and that I am married and I have children If a married woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant and has Children, this indicates a lot of good that will come to her, and a lot of money, and the dream can be interpreted as having a new child. My friend dreamed that I was pregnant when I was married. Pregnancy in a dream for a married woman is good and a good omen, and evidence of an improvement in living and housing conditions and economic and social circumstances. The vision also indicates good news, because pregnancy with a child is good news, and some scholars interpreted this vision as a visionary who performs good and charitable deeds and helps others. Seeing a woman I know pregnant in a dream If this woman in the dream is unmarried and she is pregnant, this means that she will fall into a predicament and great distress, or that

title: Interpretation of a dream about fear of surgery

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of fear of surgery in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream of fear of surgery in a dream, which is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are a number of interpretations that the site explains, quoting the interpretations of some working scholars who are trying to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream of fear of surgery in a dream Anyone who dreams that he is afraid of undergoing surgery may indicate the difficulties and problems that the dreamer faces in his life at that time. It is possible that seeing fear of undergoing surgery indicates mistakes that the dreamer may make in his life during those days. Seeing fear of surgery in a dream may indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life and that he will get rid of them, thanks be to God. It is possible to see in a dream fear of surgery, which indicates a financial crisis that the dreamer may face a lot, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of stealing shoes from a mosque in a dream Stealing shoes from a mosque in a dream may indicate the dreamer's commitment to worship and obedience, praise be to God. Whoever dreams of stealing a shoe from a mosque may indicate doing undesirable things at this time, and God knows best. In the case of dreaming of stealing a shoe from a mosque in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer has moved away from God Almighty, and accordingly To repent and return to God Almighty. Whoever sees in his dream that he stole the shoe when he left the mosque, this may indicate a sin that he continues to commit, and he must repent and return to the Blessed and the High. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of black pimples on the face in a dream The appearance of black pimples in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is exposed to envy from those close to him. If a vision of black pimples appears on the face in a dream, it may indicate a warning sign of the dreamer's distance from God Almighty. The dream of the appearance of black pimples on the face may indicate that the dreamer is distancing himself from some good people in his life and doing bad deeds. Whoever sees in his dream the appearance of black pimples on his face may indicate serious mistakes that may befall him in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of my infant son's teeth in a dream The appearance of a child's teeth in a dream may indicate good things coming to the dreamer in the coming period. The dream of my son's teeth appearing in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer during this period of his life. Whoever sees in his dream that his son had teeth when he was a child, this may indicate the good things coming that the dreamer will get in his life in the coming period. A woman's dream that her child has teeth It can indicate the future joys of the dreamer in your life during the coming period, and God knows best. In the event that there is a vision of visiting the house of the deceased grandfather in a dream, this may indicate solidarity between family members during this time. Whoever dreams that he was visiting the house of his grandfather

title: Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the form of a human being I know, by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: To interpret a dream about a jinn in the form of someone I know, seeing a jinn in a dream is one of the terrifying visions that strike terror into the soul of its owner, because jinn are creatures that arouse terror simply by mentioning their names in reality or in a dream. The interpretation of what he saw. This interpretation will be explained through the following lines in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the image of someone I know. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that the appearance of a jinn in the form of a human in a dream symbolizes the fortuneteller’s position in society. This dream may symbolize that the dreamer is in a bad mood. He has hatred for others and seeks to harm them. If one sees in a dream that jeans are represented in the form of a person. Seeing him means that he will face difficulties or lose something he loves. And if this person is known to the dreamer. That is, man is evil, corrupt, and far from his Lord and religion. This vision may indicate that the dreamer does not keep a vow to make himself better. The vision is a message to him that he must act. Hiding jeans in the form of a co-worker in a dream indicates the presence of someone who has a grudge against him and wishes him to lose his job. A merchant who dreams that the jinn is in the form of a man he deals with should pay attention, because the dream indicates That his trade is tainted by something forbidden. Whoever wants to travel and dreams that he is crazy in the form of a traveler with him, his dream indicates that there will be disputes with the people he is traveling with in reality. Interpretation of a dream of a jinn in the form of a man for a single woman. A single woman’s dream of wearing jeans in the form of Someone in her house who treats her well leads to the presence of someone who has a grudge against her and is planning to harm her. This person could be a man with whom you have a romantic relationship or a friend who is not good to her. Whoever sees in her dream a pair of jeans in the shape of a person with whom she does not feel comfortable. Her vision showed the strength of her character and her ability to see people as they are. When a single woman dreams of someone and then discovers that he is a genie. This means that God Almighty blessed her with insight that enables her to know the truth of those around her. This dream may indicate the presence of a person who is aware of the dreamer’s envy of his life. If an unmarried woman sees a jinn in the form of a human in her dream and recites the Qur’an to him. This is an indication of his ability to overcome difficulties and problems. If the person representing the jinn in his image is from the dreamer’s house. This indicates that there are problems between them, but they will not last long. Seeing one jinn in the form of a woman indicates that there is someone who is jealous of the visionary and hates her. This vision may indicate the presence of a girl seeking to cause trouble between the dreamer and his family. Interpretation of a dream of a jinn in the form of a man for a married woman’s dream A woman married to a jinn in the form of her husband indicates that she is surrounded by bad friends or that she is backward in matters of her religion. This dream may indicate the possibility that the dreamer will become a victim of fraud or theft. If the jinn is disguised in the form of her husband, he sleeps next to the dreamer in bed in the dream. This means that she will face a crisis in her life. Everyone in her dream sees a genie in human form and talks to him. Her vision showed that she trusts an evil woman to help her solve her personal problems, so she should be wary of her. If the jinn is represented in the image of a woman in a dream,

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing coins in a dream

preview.html: Coins in a dream The appearance of coins in a dream is one of the things that confuses the dreamer, distracts him, and makes him go to the Internet to find out what this dream means? Does it bring him happiness and comfort in the coming days, or does it have other unpleasant interpretations? Therefore, in this topic, we will discuss the interpretation of coins in a dream and clarify some matters related to them, the meanings of which vary according to the fortuneteller himself. Seeing coins in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing coins in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about coins has different meanings for the dreamer, and it is an indicator of happiness and living. While some of them can be interpreted as staying away from goodness, and God knows best. Increasing these coins with a person in a dream is one of the promising things for him to stabilize circumstances and increase his material livelihood. As for the echo that affects this money, it is not interpreted as happiness, it is a sign of hearing someone Sad news or the words of someone who hates him or speaks badly about him in general. It should be noted that the loss of this money and its appearance by the person and its reduction in general means that he will be exposed to one of the financial obstacles in the near future, such as losing part of the money related to his trade. Or reducing his salary at work. The dream of coins is interpreted according to some matters related to the dreamer’s personality, in addition to being male or female, but also according to the difference in social status, some indications are clear in the vision. It can be said that giving the dreamer a lot of coins inside a certain thing means That he will soon meet people who will bring some secrets into his life and seek to keep them completely and hope that no one will know about them. The person with the vision must refrain from revealing the secret. What is the interpretation of seeing money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that coins are a sign of food and happiness in a dream, and therefore the more he is with the dreamer, the more goodness and comfort there is for him. Obtaining this money in The dream is one of the pleasant things for the dreamer as well, as it promises him that his financial conditions will improve in reality and relieve him of the suffering associated with lack of livelihood. As for giving it to a family member or friend, this is not good news for the dreamer, as some serious flaws in his personality appear, such as his tendency to quarrels. And arguments and lack of calm. If the dreamer sees that he is asking someone to take coins, he is expected to suffer the loss of some of his rights in reality and always seeks to regain them, but he cannot. Ibn Sirin goes to the idea that collecting this money from the land means expanding his livelihood. A person and meet him happily in his next life. It is also expected that if the dreamer has a lot of this money, but feels sad in the dream, he will likely suffer painful harm in his coming days and it will bring him a lot of sadness and sorrow. It indicates that receiving this money Lending it is not a sign of evil like paper money, but rather it is an expression of a good relationship between people and a confirmation of the idea of ​​mutual love and honesty.
